OOC: Just wanted you to know I had my weapons approved by Hugar. So 
there's nothing wrong with this. And the reason I asked you to do that 
was so no one would say I was posting for someone elses char.

Mustex extends his hand in greeting.

Mustex:  Hello I'm Mustex. I'm hoping your a friend. My guess would be 
that you're an Autobot.  I'm a Maximal.  We're Autobot descendants. I 
think you've been in there a looooooooong time.

> OOC: As you wish!
>

> acquired. Identification: #654148. Name: Unknown. Allegeance: 
Autobot.

the
